description: Deletes the profile of the currently signed-in user. A deleted user profile can no longer be used to sign in and can't be restored. Authorize this action with a signed-in user's access token. It must include the scope aws.cognito.signin.user.admin.

parameters.name: AccessToken
parameters.description: A valid access token that Amazon Cognito issued to the currently signed-in user. Must include a scope claim for aws.cognito.signin.user.admin.
